body: Some fetchlings can manipulate shadowy energy in order to displace their location instead of transporting between shadows. Upon reaching 9th level, instead of gaining shadow walk as a spell-like ability, these fetchlings gain displacement as a spell-like ability usable twice per day. For this ability, a fetchling's caster level is equal to his total Hit Dice. This racial trait modifies the spell-like ability racial trait.
name: Gloom Shimmer
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/Alternate Racial Traits/Gloom Shimmer
